mapper.select: SELECT mk.title AS title, ml.member_id AS memberId, mk.enddate AS enddate, mi.file_path AS imagePath FROM memberlist ml JOIN makemate mk ON ml.makemate_idx = mk.idx JOIN member m ON ml.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT member_id, file_path FROM member_image WHERE idx IN ( SELECT MIN(idx) FROM member_image GROUP BY member_id ) ) mi ON m.id = mi.member_id WHERE mk.member_id = #{hostId}
